title: Finder, Volume 03: One Wing in the Viewfinder
description: From back cover:"You're coming with me...even to the depths of hell."Akihito is finally ready to let down his guard and face his complicated feelings for Asami. But just as the two men surrender to the sweet push-and-pull of unrestrained lust, Akihito falls for a trap set by the ruthless (and gorgeous) Fei Long! One false move may mean lights-out for both Akihito and Asami. Will they outwit Fei Long and live to see another day...together?FINDER is the stunning original boys-love series that revolutionized the genre, and now it's back in a brand-new reissue! A wily photographer, the most powerful shot-callers on the streets and the friends who get mixed-up in the fray all trade partners and gunfire in a high-stakes race for pleasure and power. In the end, who will control the intertwined fates of these beautiful, merciless men?
author: Ayano Yamane
